website_summaries.verdict: It may not be the most compact portable speaker on the block, but the Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 offers useful extras and great sound for an affordable price.
pros: The Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 offers an understated, travel-friendly design that's compatible with both iPods and other MP3 players (via auxiliary line-in), and it includes GSM shielding for use with the iPhone.
and comes with a travel case and an innovative wall charger.
The included remote lets you navigate the iPod's menus
cons: The remote's range isn't very good, and the Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 isn't as compact as many portable speaker options

customer_reviews.title: Great dock with easy controls
customer_reviews.text: Compact, plays all ipods, even old ones. Good sound and completely controllable by buttons on top. After a while the rechargeable battery wears down and you have to keep it plugged in, but that's ok with me. I have one that I had given to me about 10 years ago which is still working fine. Bought this one for my aunt, who is in a healthcare facility for the rest of her life--paired with an ipod, it's very simple to turn on and off. I still have the remote to mine, but never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee Danvers

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one I already have and love which lasted 8 years of daily use in my kitchen. I was surprised to find that it is brand new and identical to my original. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: tina and kids

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, good sound but terrible overall! Why? First the auto detect feature that controls source input through the rear jack shuts the thing off after a minute or so whenever I try to use it. That makes it impossible to use as an auxiliary speaker for my laptop, tablet or other device, even for my ipod or iphone if I want to connect by cable instead of the silly docking slot. Second, the thing has failed and now won't charge any device plugged into the docking slot.
customer_reviews.author: Di Pi

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Arrived with carrying case, charger and remote without a scratch. Unit sounds great especially considering the price of less than $20.00. Holds a charge very well and overall I do not regret this purchase. My only star subtracting complaint is how this unit automatically shuts off while being fed an active signal. The remedy for this is to make sure the signal is sufficiently "hot" enough in order for it to not kick off. Keeping the gain output high on the source device and then controlling the volume on the Logitech eliminates this annoying little bug.
customer_reviews.author: Paradiddle3

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I currently own a Logitech similar to this one. I use it continually and the sound is excellent for what it is designed to do (provide portable sound). So my nephew for Christmas wanted a portable speaker. I saw this on Amazon and knew that this would be an excellent choice. The reason I am giving this a 1 has nothing to do with the product but with the packaging. The speaker came with connections for an overseas market (different volts). Amazon made return easy and I expect to receive a credit in the future. As for my nephew, we ended up going to the Sony outlet store and getting him a speaker (at a higher cost).
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but the power saver feature turns the unit off unexpectedly. Repeated reset did not resolve the problem. A number of other reviewers have noted this exact problem so it is not an isolated issue. Why would Logitech release this product without fixing the design flaw? After some searching, I found a possible solution on the Logitech User Forum "Set your mp3 at the loudest level and your Logitech Pure-fi Anywhere 2 at the volume you want. Apparently, the reason supposedly is that when your mp3 is not at the loudest, the unit doesn't always catch the signal". So far, that solution is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dock Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these from Apple ($169 at the time and well worth it) when I first got my IPOD Nano 4. I LOVE IT!!! It charges and has a 10-hour backup charge, which means I can take it to play without having to plug it into outside electricity. It recharges my IPOD when plugged into electricity (not when using the charged unit by itself). The sound is amazing. I replaced it only because the connector on the back for the charge plug wore out and won't hold the plug anymore and it was cheaper to replace the unit ($49) than to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: it stops working on bluetooth after couple years
customer_reviews.text: love this size and sound is very nice what would you do without music this little gem can go anywhere. it used to work without a cord but now I have to be near electricity
customer_reviews.author: Linda J.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong AC adapter, and no ipod adapter.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's graduation Friday morning. It is now Wednesday morning. The thing came with a non USA, ac adapter. There is no iPod adapter as promised. The manual is the pits. I don't know what to do. I am bed ridden and cannot trot down to Radio Shack for new adapters. Amazon has always been wonderful to me before. I am pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rey Black

customer_reviews.title: Use with iPhone 4S daily!
customer_reviews.text: I use this device to cradle my iPhone - daily. I travel frequently and it works beautifully in wherever I go. It is truly portable so I take it down to the pool, in my office or wherever. Very happy with my purchase. I will say that this is my second Logitech - the first one would inexplicably increase the volume as high as it would on my iPod so I gave it to my nephew and it worked fine on his iPhone. I took a chance, bought another and I am glad I did - I have really been pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Snootybuyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this older style dock for years. My first one lasted about five years being taken everywhere including many sandy trips to the beach. It still works but eventually one of the buttons started falling off so I replaced it with the new version. I keep the old one on hand as a back up. The old version is better, has the same volume capacity and last longer on battery life. Its also more compact and has a better carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Six Months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this unit for the first few months. It has amazing volume and tone, especially considering its small size. I used it daily and it was with me in the car for many long trips. It filled the entire house with terrific sound. However, after about 6 months, the on/off and volume buttons broke in half and fell off, and it began shutting down in mid song. It limped along in that mode for a while, then stopped charging my iPod as well. For the price, I expected much better construction. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Koi Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, wrong adapter initially
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound from this player. I bought two of these within a month of each other (one was a gift). The adapter that came with the gift player is European. Customer Service responded immediately, but what they sent is a standard converter, instead of what I expected to be the original US adapter for this product. I kept the one with the converter and gave the original adapter to my friend, as it was embarrassing to suggest a converter instead of the original manufactured adapter. Hopefully this player continues to perform despite the need for the converter.
customer_reviews.author: Jkm

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: This is great unit that delivers great sound, is user friendly, in a nice size. The remote works well, and it does charge your ipod and the unit so it can be used anywhere indoors or outdoors. The sound is grate for a small unit. Had one that was my sister-in-law's (which my wife seems to think is hers), but when I saw it for this price, I couldn't pass it up. Paid $149.99 +tx for first one. If you buy this. I think you will love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Hogman

customer_reviews.title: Small and Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I am purely delighted with this small wonder. I do not like to wear earphones for over a half-hour, and this speaker gives me good sound from my iPods without the aggravation of ear plugs. The fidelity is very good even at low volume, and I appreciate the bass. I especially enjoy the convenience of the remote control which works perfectly. I find myself listening to the radio, especially NPR, through the iPod touch as it gives better and more reliable fidelity than my regular radios.
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: The speakers produce great sound; as good as the Bose iPod dock ...
customer_reviews.text: The speakers produce great sound; as good as the Bose iPod dock I previously had. The problem is with the remote control: it does not work at all.I tried replacing the battery and moving the unit away from other electronics. Nothing helped. I am keeping it anyway because I like its sound, small size and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Selsi

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: Great little system. Enjoy the portability and relatively long battery life between charges. Included charger/adapter is US 120 volt. Noticed some of the older reviews had an issue with the charger. Overall a superior rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY BAD
customer_reviews.text: The lack of quality of this is beyond belief. It is plastic not sturdy or durable the way it looks in the picture, the sound buttons DO NOT work nor did the remote that came with a dead battery. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I would have sent it back but it was a gift I was soo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: carole jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for speakers so I could play my music on Ipod touch while reading and working at my workstation. After listening and trying different speakers I fell for the Pure-Fi Anywhere. Since I couldn't afford Bose speakers, the Pure-fi actually is the same quality and sound of Bose for about half the price. Rich sounds and just a great purchase. I can carry them with me wherever I go and I like the accessories that came with them. Truly a great buy and I would recommend the Logitech for all Ipod users.
customer_reviews.author: JR43

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for a better iPod sound value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, based on reviews at Amazon and other places. They were right, this small box puts out great sound with tight base and a excellent overall range. It is compact, solid and the included well made carrying case protects it during travel. The whole thing feels solid and sounds that way too - and the price was very reasonable, compared to the prices of much more expensive iPod portable speaker systems and that sound essentially the same. And my college-aged son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good portable iPod speaker system
customer_reviews.text: After I made vacation plans, I purchased this Logitech speaker system and have been pleased. I am using it in my office and it has ease of use in order to lower the sound quickly when I need to do so. The sound is surprisingly full and it will be a great companion for our cruise. It will enable me to listen to my music and podcasts in our cabin, and have my wife enjoy the content with me without hooking the iPod up to dual headphones, which are restricting. The system also recharges the internal battery when plugged in. Good work, Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Does not come with US power adapter!
customer_reviews.text: Read the description carefully. I ordered this for my wife through Amazon in the US for use in the US. It says it includes an international power adapter. I assumed it would also include the US adapter... Bad assumption. The sound is pretty good for what little we've been able to use it. Just the partial charge it came with. Have a trouble ticket in with Logitech but no response yet. If we can't get a US adapter we'll have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: EricInDayton

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Anywhere Speakers for i-Pod
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my i-pod & love my portable speakers. I don't think the battery life is quite 10 hours as suggested, however, it is at least 6-7. I have never used it for longer than that. My only real complaint about this product is that the remote is pretty much useless unless you are directly in front of the speakers. And the sound quality is not the best out there but it is pretty darn good. Let's face it... you get what you pay for & this product is well worth the money. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this item to use with my iPod Nano 4GB - it works like a charm. Sounds really good for the price - if you spend a lot more money, I am sure you can get a better sound, BOSE for example - however I don't have that kind of money. This is playing my music exceptionally well - I listen to rock and classical, even my opera tracks sound great - it has a nice base sound and is easy to set up. Comes with adapters for loads of other ipods. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ShiresLassTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these speakers. I have no issue with them so far. They have a good sound for the price and the battery lasts as long as I ever need it. They have avery slick design and look nice on the counter. The fold-up stands on the back are a nice feature and the remote makes changing songs or controlling volume a lot less effort. I have been happy with this product and it is as good now as it was when I bought it 4 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Battery usage
customer_reviews.text: The remote controller does not work with my iPod. The internal battery is good for about ten hours. I would prefer batteries that can be changed as needed especially when I have the device on extended (several day) trip without power to re charge.
customer_reviews.author: pamilla

customer_reviews.title: Started Great, Ended Very Badly
customer_reviews.text: Initially this worked great. Within a couple of months, it started shutting down whenever there was a lull in the music. Then the remote stopped working. So I bought new remote control from them. It wasn't the remote. The thing inside the docking that reads it had stopped working. So now I'm stuck with this thing that I can't use half the time. Even adjusting the sound level is a problem because without the remote, you can only raise/lower the sound by pressing a button and the adjustments are rather less incremental than one would like, going from too loud to too quiet with no in-between. I really, really hate this thing.
customer_reviews.author: cristobal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound, Battery Life, Style & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black one for my wife's pink Nano 4G. They look great together. They work great together. The sound is excellent. The battery last a very long time (over 5 hours at which point I stopped paying attention). This is a solid choice. Make sure you pay attention and buy the latest version (#2), and not the original which may have had issues. They look identical, and there is still stock of the original version floating around, especially in the refurbish product market.
customer_reviews.author: Zarasa

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved this product
customer_reviews.text: the audio, the battery life and the ease of use have always made me a BIG fan. Problem was I-Phone made some changes and I actually haven't upgraded because I like this logitech so much and have so many other items that are rated for the ipone 4S. GIve me a good reason to change apart from my eyesight changing......
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hase

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker system has great sound for its size. I use this on the golf course and unless I hit large bump the Ipod stays in the spearker system. If you are looking for solid sound system for the price this is it. Just remember this isn't bose system or the cost of the bose so adjust your expectations. But for the record I get no distortion in the system, but I don't have this on the max volume either. Just good solid sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MarkW

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Come with every adapter you'll ever need, and a carrying case. I bought it because my Bose would not charge my 4th Gen Nano. This one will. The sound is nearly as good as from the Bose costing 3 times more. Battery life I don't think will meet the 12 hour expectation as I left it on one night expecting it to be still have a charge the next morning. It did not. Still, it should be adequate for most outings.It is light and easy to carry in an overnight bag.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Pure-Fi is small & portable, but don't let that fool you-- these speakers have an excellent sound quality, and they can pack punch! The intensity (volume) booster is a plus, but even without that, these speakers can fill a room. These system is ultra portable, it self-charges when plugged in, it charges iPhones and iPods. I am totally pleased w/ this product and want to buy another one for other rooms in my house... or to take to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good.  iPhone 3G compatible (sort of).
customer_reviews.text: The product has very good sound for it's size and handily charges the iPhone 3G to boot. Two downsides to this product. although minor, are: 1) Remote control has limited distance capabilities to it and must be pointed nearly directly at the speakers to function. 2) No adaptor is included that will directly fit the iPhone 3G although one is not really necessary for it to work properly. I'd buy it again and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leucadian

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Pure-Fi is wonderful. The speakers sound great and the battery life is terrific. I recently took it on a cruise and had it plugged in half the time and it worked wonderfully either way. The remote works well and is easy to use. It also comes in a nice cloth case and the cord and remote fit perfectly in the ipod slot when not in use. It's a very well thought-out design. I also love it that it charges both my ipod and iphone, and I've now moved it to my bedroom and put my iphone in it to charge even when I'm not using the speakers. Terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: KA in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Works good with my Ipod remote does most functions
customer_reviews.text: Works good with my Ipod remote does most functions. The volume is loud but not the power of my Bose portable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much that we bought it again. It hits highs and lows really nicely, and the bass boost is wonderful. We use it every night for 12 hours, every day for 4, and it lasted 2 years. I hope this second one we've purchased lasts just as long, because we haven't found another one with similar sound quality yet.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one that was stolen. Couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Drady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable iTouch Player
customer_reviews.text: I have had this player for about a month. I love it! It is much easier to put my iTouch into this player and hear the sound throughout my house, than messing with the player in my home theater system. I am not an audiophile, so music (pop, top 40, dance) all sound great to me with this player. It charges the iTouch when the iTouch is docked, it charges the player, when the iTouch is not docked (assuming the power cord is plugged int).
customer_reviews.author: Nickie in Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  I was disappointed about the charger
customer_reviews.text: I find it hard to believe that the fact that a U.S. charger was not included was waaaaaaaay down on the page. When buying this type of product (even though it says it has an international "adapter) you expect to get a charger. If it's not for the U.S. then why the need to say an international adapter is included. I normally like Logitech products. I will not purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K. Floan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Battery LIfe
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged this system didn't even make it through a 3 hour bike ride! 10 hours? I'd be happy with half of that... which I didn't even get. I'm going to look around for better options and possibly return this thing in the next few days. I love how easy to use it is and how light it feels, but the battery life makes all that next to meaningless if you can't enjoy your tunes for a good duration. Definitely not worth anywhere close to the $100 price tag
customer_reviews.author: Ham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, unresponsive seller
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years now and love it! The sound is decent, it charges quickly and it's portable. My one star off is because the seller sent me a European plug and never replied to my emails requesting they remedy the problem so I had to buy an American adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: "Anywhere"... except the U.S.!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: A U.S. power adapter is NOT included. The product description says, "Take it anywhere in the world; the AC adapter works on most electrical power grids worldwide." Take it anywhere except he U.S., evidently. This needs to be made clear in the product description. Included in the box is an international voltage AC power adapter only. Buyers will have to purchase a U.S. AC/DC adapter separately.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel buddy
customer_reviews.text: In my house, music goes on in the morning even before the coffee. Needless to say, when I'm traveling or spending time outdoors I like to have the ability to listen to my selections, not the local radio station's. I wanted something compact (love the little travel bag this comes with) and with good sound. The StereoXL technology definitely creates a roomful of sound. I also auditioned the Altec Lansing IM600, and the Logictech won hands down. The only shortcoming is if you like lots of BASS -- and the best sound quality is definitely not by cranking it to the limit. All in all, you can't beat the quality at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Montauk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; not great sound output
customer_reviews.text: I saw this first at Best Buy. The salesman there said that it would fill 2000 sq. feet. Not so much. I have a big office, and at full volume, it is adequate, but not much beyond that. I kept thinking I was using it incorrectly, but after reading the instructions, evidently not. When the singer drops his/her voice, you can barely hear it even when one is one or two feet away. As for ease of use and convenience, it couldn't be better. But the volume issues mean that I can't use it for presentations and large groups, as I was planning. (Actually not even medium sized groups. If they can't fit into my office, they won't hear it.)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful dock.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful dock...had to get an adapter for my new phone, but well worth the money I paid for it. Take it with me outside when working in the yard and on every trip I make. I have had it for almost 2 years and have not had any problems. The only complaint I would have is: It automatically shuts off after my timer goes off (when playing Pandora at bedtime) and my alarm will not go off in the morning : (
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN RAY

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a rechargeable radio for my iPod. This turned out to be perfect. It also allows other mp3 players to doc with it. When plugged in, it charges both the speakers' batteries as well as the iPod. It lasts quite a while. It is not so flimsy as to be of worry. I have taken it camping several times. The batteries continue to last many hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Isenhart

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend a year ago and he loves it. It's still working perfectly fine and the music sounds clear and loud. It's nice and small so you can take it anywhere. Comes with case and charger. The only thing I didn't like about it is that it looked used and he had to put something in the inside to make his phone/ipod stand up. Overall he likes it though and that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: ASPEN CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Pure Fi - Heaven
customer_reviews.text: This unit is just what I expected I'm a Creative Hobbyist and I made some changes to this unit to accommodate my I-Fone5 needless to say it works wonders.I love the slick silver and Black gloss finish,and the sound is outstanding for such a compact portable unit. I take it everywhere and its easy to share your music with others.
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the OR
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a compact speaker system for the operating room for quite awhile that was both rechargeable and could recharge my iphone while in there. This is perfect. The only complaint I have is that the remote response time is often sluggish and the buttons on top of the unit are very stiff making it difficult to increase or lower the volume in small increments. Otherwise, the thing is all i wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not up to Logitech's usual quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, and I like that it has a rechargeable battery and a carrying case. The volume is touchy. It jumps from too loud or too soft with one button press. Hard to get it to the volume you want. The AC adapter makes a high pitched squeal. I like that it has a separate audio in jack since my ipod is in a case that doesn't fit into the dock, so I just plug in the audio cable.
customer_reviews.author: Par4dox

customer_reviews.title: Euro Power?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this right before Christmas as a gift for my niece, but on opening it saw that it had a European power supply. In all fairness, I did not get a chance to use it and the company did take it back at their cost with no problem. But, it was a fail as far as a product meant for the US market goes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wood

customer_reviews.title: Overall A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale knowing that the player had issues with auto shut off and potential battery problems. We get about 4-5 hours with a fully charged battery (not the 10 hours it claims). The player has only shut off once due to the volume issue. The sound quality is fantastic and the shortened battery life has really not been a big deal for us. The remote is cheaply made but it does what is supposed to do. A handle for the player and a hard case would make this near perfect. For the price anyone would be hard pressed to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Mandor

customer_reviews.title: Still own and still love this portable device
customer_reviews.text: Still own and still love this portable device. I would recommend this to others, but i noticed the price is much higher than when i first purchased mine. Anyway, ENJOY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd D.,

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I give it about a 3.5. The value is amazing: $100 for a portable speaker system with an internal battery. I wanted the Bose portable sound doc, but this one was 1/4 of the price, so I shouldn't be disappointed with the sound quality, but I still am. The volume doesn't go as high as I expected it too and the sound quality is similar to my car speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I have our own music on our iphones. Plus so does the rest of our family.. This is the perfect product to use to share our music with each other when we host parties, etc. It fills up the room with music and makes a get-together more livelier. Only downside, is I cannot seem to get the remote to work. May have to change out the batteries it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Mindless Analytical

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Player for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 as a dock to charge my iPhone, play music, and to get portable speakers that could be used outdoors. The sound is pure, the volume range is great, and thankfully there is no interference, white noise or crackling that I heard on other players. I first learned that it needed a 2 hour charge so that it would respond to the remote control or even to it's onboard control buttons (volume +/-, On/Off). So far the battery life is good, and I get over 3 hours of use per charge. It's does all of the things I wanted: charges my iPhone, plays the songs and can play outdoors on batteries. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schnee

customer_reviews.title: It is now the first week of July and it is totally out of orde/ I am so disappointed, I would reall like a refund but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered first week of April, First week of June, it stopped working up to par. It is now the first week of July and it is totally out of orde/ I am so disappointed, I would reall like a refund but don't know how to get one; so all I can do is let everyone know that this unit will work great for a month .... Maybe two. Don't waste your $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: tracyk

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Work with iPhone 4S
customer_reviews.text: I used this product at my brother's house and loved it, but when we ordered our own, the stereo speakers failed to operate with the iPhone 4S. It comes with adapters (but only for previous versions of the iPhone) so I bought an adapter, but the phone would not remain upright enough in the stand to make uninterrupted contact with the device. I called the Logitech Help Line for more suggestions, but ended up returning the product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ackenhausen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for back in the day
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for back in the day. Rechargeable, charges your device as well. Long battery life, nice pouch to carry around in. Great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and has decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby for his birthday. It's easy to use and has decent sound quality. Not a huge amount of bass and wouldn't be enough to be the sole source of music for a party, but we'll invest in a proper stereo system for those requirements. I like that it's portable so you can take it to the beach and on picnics, but we haven't tested that out yet so can't comment on the battery life. Overall I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I owned the previous model which I was very happy with. Unfortunately, due to water damage, I had to replace it. The new version has the added benefit of charging my IPhone. Otherwise , it's exactly the same. I highly recommend this product. It has great sounds, and is lightweight with a rechargeable battery. So, you can use it anywhere. The only negative, is having to switch out different cradles when I switch between by Ipod and my Iphone. However, it's a minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthman

customer_reviews.title: Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound from the speakers is outstanding. But the remote does not work. Have contacted Logitech. My old remote to my old speakers (Logitech) that are 7 years old works with the new ones. So it is not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product...one flaw noticed
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few different docks and tried some at stores. By far this had the best sound. I also looked at reviews and this had great reviews. I love the sound so I give 5 stars for that..but one flaw brings the rating down to 4. The remote does not function as advertised with Apple iPhone 1st Gen. With the remote you can switch the dock on and off, increase volume but you cannot change tracks or go back in the menu. I called support and they said this is one of the complaints with 1st gen iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nathan

customer_reviews.title: AS EVERYONE SAYS THIS PRODUCT IS CRAP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: JUST RECEIVED THIS AFTER ORDERING, GUESS WHAT? REMOTE DOES NOT WORK!! TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION SAYS REPLACE THE BATTERY!! WHY SHOULD I HAVE TO GO BUY A NEW BATTERY ALREADY IF IT REALLY IS THE BATTERY!! STAY AWAY FROM THIS PIECE OF CRAP. CAN'T BELEIVE THAT PLACES STILL STOCK THIS TO SELL AND THE LOGITECH IS STILL IN BUSINESS!! OH YEAH BECAUSE THEY TAKE YOUR MONEY AND REFUSE TO ADDRESS THE ISSUES. HOW SAD, COULD HAVE BEEN REWORKED AND BEEN A BIG HIT. SHAME ON YOU LOGITECH!!!
customer_reviews.author: LORANZA

customer_reviews.title: pure-fi review
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. It couples to her IPOD and IPhone 3G so she is able to access all her ITUNES created music lists. The sound quality is excellent for so compact a unit. The controls are easy to understand and use and the warranty appears complete. It comes with an adaptor and a soft carry case. Good job logitech.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: System works excellent with a medium volume setup
customer_reviews.text: System works excellent with a medium volume setup, Positives: 1. easy to used 2. remote control has enough signal for a normal distance 3. a medium volume sound quality is excellent 4. easy to transport Negatives: 1. battery life is too short when the volume is high not the 8 hours as the features show 2. with all the volume quality sound decrease
customer_reviews.author: Mr triple A. A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love my Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere unit. The sound quality is pure and the volume is loud enough to hear from the other side of the house or in the yard. Easy to use & my I-Pod fits directly, plus it comes with adapters for other I-pods & I-phones. I am so glad I purchased this product
customer_reviews.author: Rural Reader

customer_reviews.title: good camp stereo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping because it is small and easy to stash. The sound is great. One time, around ten at night we were playing one the picnic table near the fire. A ranger approached to have us turn the sound down. He took a double take when he saw where the sound was coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Smartcows

customer_reviews.title: 30 Pin Bargains
customer_reviews.text: Look out for a LOT of good buys on IPod and IPhone items with 30 pin docks as Apple4 was quite abrupt at changing to the new connector. This was initially a $100+ Luxo-type item you can now get for $50 or far less. Sounds good and lots of goodies in the package like remote and carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Geddoff Myazz

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 and I am very happy with the sound. Like previous reviewers, I don't think it can compete with the 'much more expensive Bose system," but for the money, this little unit can fill a moderate size room with sound. When it came, the remote control did not work. I had to purchase a new battery. Small inconvenience. The remote works now and does almost everything. My ipod nano 4G fits right on the docking station and works like a dream. I would have given it 5 stars if not for the battery issue. Time will tell if it is a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of these before my divorce so now I bought my own. I love this model and if this one goes I will buy another one again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy V

customer_reviews.title: This is our second
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a tiny package. The charger broke on the first one - replaced it and then the battery died (5 years old), and it's not user-replaceable. Didn't think I'd pay more than $50. for another one - found it on sale! My wife uses it for business, so it gets used quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: B@PA

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He loves it and uses it everyday. We love that it is portable and we have the ability to take it anywhere with us. The sound is great and some levels are adjustable. It fits all of our ipods and the iphone (without a case). The carry case is great. The unit charges quickly and easily. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a portable player. A great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker dock presents a really nice sound but not quite the same sound quality as an old Sonic Impact dock I still use. It is light and very portable and has neat clean lines. It was shipped and delivered just as expected from Amazon with no hitches. Scale of 1 to 10 I would rate it an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Rodster

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this and my old iPod nano as my LR stereo system. It is loud enough and can be used remote control. I don't use it often enough to remember. The good part is that it keeps the nana charged and I can use it with my other apple stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: FHM

customer_reviews.title: Low battery time
customer_reviews.text: When battery was fully charged it only lasted for 1 1/2 hours before going dead. This is my only complaint the sound was really good for a unit this size
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. Totally plays music loud and clear, my husband comments often on how surprised he is at how much sound is put out by it. I have had mine for more then 5 years and the only thing I would change on it is that it used to charge the batttery on it so I could unplug from wall and walk around with it, that feature does not work and the way it holds the ipod in it is a bit loose and so conncection every once in a while is not what it should. Other then that, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are of very good quality, for both classic and contemporary music. Quite remarkable for their size. I don't like the remote control, which needs to be pointed at the speakers for them to work properly. All in all, I recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Data Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Surprising sound!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these years ago for personal use and was amazed by its expansive sound and ease of use. I use this a lot on the job, and when traveling. I have incorporated these in several bathroom designs with a dedicated niche (I am a professional remodeler), and have purchased a few of these as gifts. Compact, easy to use, great fidelity.
customer_reviews.author: ebock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and I love smaller size. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Zimpel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my ITouch (large pin)- So pleased to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Wachter

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but very poor construction quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, 1 month after I bought it the power button broke off. A month later I could see that the volume buttons had started to crack, and finally after 3 months the connection between the Ipod and the unit broke off so know it is useless. When it worked the quality of the sound was good but the product has a very poor construction quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good product, iPOD centric which is a pain if you're not following the herd
customer_reviews.text: Nice product when you use it with an iPod...sucks a-a-a-sss when you use it with any other MP3 player...remote only really works with iPod connected...same with any other device controls like forwarding to next song (or any other device controls beyond volume)...any other MP3 has to connect through the jack in the back...product description doesn't explain the non-iPod limitations...ticked me off...but I have an iPod nano and it's a nice device when you use it with an Apple player. If you're looking for a generic MP3 speaker box, this is not your best bet, and the seller is less than honest about what it can't do.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Gormley

customer_reviews.title: I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little units. It won't rock a beach party, but at my desk, or at the cabin it has good sound, charges the iPod, and sports a Li-ion battery. I bought one for my son, liked it and bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: KenDay

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable speakers
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this is that it doesn't come with a car charger. It makes perfect sense that the company would make one so that it is even more portable & rechargeable. When I'm at a park all day or camping, I'd LOVE the option to just plug it into my car to recharge it rather than having to find a power source. Come on Logitech--get one produced so that I don't end up experimenting with others that may ultimately blow out the system if they aren't a right match. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: corvallismusiclover

customer_reviews.title: I returned mine
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the one that I received was defective, but I honestly think that the sound quality of unit was average at best. From all the positive reviews, I was expecting a very full and rich audio experience, but was greeted by reality. The reality is that it sounds like a small set of computer speakers....pretty flat across the board. Also, mine kept shutting off on its own at higher volume levels. If you really need a small and portable ipod/iphone speaker system, then by all means buy it. However, if you value sound quality, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping and my Son's dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Gotta like this one for the price....Adequate sound even if you like it loud. The ajoining campers on my last trip will attest to the quality of Pink Floyd. Rechargable battery and remote are a bonus. Have heard less from units that cost way more and take up more room.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Ok item.
customer_reviews.text: Already left a review of this item. Love this item. Please don't force your customers to write more than they want just to fill a word quota. It is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great docking station. I recharge my phone and play Pandora from it constantly. I think some high end speakers like Bose are better quality sound, but this is really good and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Good feature set with 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: I recently received this speaker to replace a very old speaker which could not charge my new iPhone 3GS. This speaker works exactly as expected - it charges the phone and does not complain about iPhone compatibility. I don't expect much from a speaker other than clear sound and this speaker sounds fine to me. However, it does have a flaw for me - it does not provide fine enough control over the volume. Every time I adjust the volume up or down, it's a pretty big jump which leaves me wishing for something in-between the two settings I just hit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 26 months, but still not a BAD purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mine died after 26 months. I have it stationary and always plugged in, and maybe several times a month I unplug it to listen to it where there is no power plug. I can use it still to listen to my iPod/Phone when it's plugged in, but it won't charge and it has to be plugged in. Paid $100 for it at the time, so it cost around $3.85 a month. All in all, it wasn't a bad investment, but now I have to replace it in order to roam.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth  the  time  effort  and  money
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system lived up to its expectations in my view. Sound quality and portability are great. Ease of use is excellent. Friends who heard it asked how to get one. I would order another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My second Logitech speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought it re-furbished but it really was brand-spanking new. Couldn't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price and size!. Check out [...] for their ratings on these, and CNet. Both rate these highly. Exciting to think that we can now enjoy some decent sounding music at an unpowered campsite on the way to Alaska!! Do wish that it had an FM receiver.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rackley

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker System
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact speaker system. It sounds awesome, much louder and clearer then you would expect. I use it all the time with my iPhone 4, playing music from the iPod app, Rhapsody, Pandora, Stitcher, etc. The included remote works great with all the apps and it has a nice carrying case. I definitely recommend this for someone looking for a way to get great sound from your iDevice on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P Williams

customer_reviews.title: Iphone compatibility
customer_reviews.text: My Iphone gives me the message that the Logitech Pure-Fi is not compatible and ask me to switch to the airplane mode. This means that I can not receive incoming calls or email while the Iphone is in the dock. This is contrary to what I was told in the info at the time that I placed the order. Otherwise is does charge my Iphone and allow me to play ipod sound tracks and audio books. The sound quality is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Superb value - excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for speakers that were multi-functional, but primarily suited for my iPod nano. After reading other reviews I chose the Logitech model. It is perfect - I can connect it to my laptop for excellent iTunes sound or take it with me to another room or outside using the lithium battery and set my iPod in the center. The base boom has great sound, with distinctly enhanced body. It came with different seats for each generation of iPod, but you can just seat the iPod on without those - its that secure. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it..but remote control doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find by my wife for Father's Day. I wanted a player for my old Ipod. It's got good volume and we use it as an alarm clock. It also have a rechargeable battery so it going to go on vacation with us for lots and lots of entertainment. The remote control doesn't work for some reason. But, the previous ipod player I had I never used the remote so I won't exactly miss that.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Speakers! I love how its rechargeable and compact for traveling, and very easy to use! It also has an AUX output so you could plug it into any other listening device if you dont want to use an ipod and is also great for expanding the sound of your Laptop speakers! Downside, you have to provide your own Auxiliary cord. I definitely recommend this to anyone, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lino E

customer_reviews.title: Unit stops working with iPod or iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with this unit. It was great from the start and I brushed off some of the reviews. However one year less one week from purchase, it has stopped working. No odd wear and tear, it just cuts out when the iPod or iPhone is playing in it. It's not an issue with sound check or volume. It just dies either on battery or power. It will work with the direct line in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheffel

product_meta.title: Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 Compact Docking Speakers for iPod and iPhone (Black)
product_meta.description:

Stow the speakers, AC adapter, and remote in the included travel case. The speakers include a built-in, rechargeable battery with a battery life indicator that lasts for 10 hours on a single charge. AMAZON.COM
Experience sound quality that's rich enough to satisfy your in-home tastes in a form factor compact enough to take with you. Logitech's Pure-Fi Anywhere 2 combines 2-inch active and 3-inch pressure drivers for crystal-clear sound and surprisingly deep bass. Take it with you to school, work, or the park. Stow the speakers, AC adapter, and remote in the included travel case. The speakers include a built-in, rechargeable battery--with a battery life indicator--that lasts for 10 hours on a single charge. Take it anywhere in the world; the AC adapter works on most electrical power grids worldwide. 

The 2-inch Max-X active, high-excursion drivers with neodymium magnets give you full, balanced audio, while the 3-inch pressure drivers maximize bass response and minimize distortions. The StereoXL technology widens the sound stage beyond the physical boundaries of the speaker. Works with all iPods and iPhones (uses the new Apple Universal Dock Adapter specification). 



10-hour Rechargeable Battery
Never worry about buying or replacing batteries. Battery Life Indicator
Know when you need to recharge. Browse and Control iPod with Wireless Remote
Ability to navigate through the iPod menu and change what is playing on your iPod. Protective Travel Case

Check Out Other Stylish iPod and MP3 Logitech Speakers

System Specifications
Supports iPhone and all iPod models with a 10-pin dock connector. The system supports older iPods (classic 1G, 2G, and 3G models), as well as other portable music players, via a 3.5-mm auxiliary input. Also, the system uses Apple's Universal Dock specification. 

What's in the Box
